name: Piedmont Lithium Inc.
description: Piedmont Lithium Inc. is a leading lithium exploration and development company focused on producing high-quality lithium hydroxide to support the growing electric vehicle (EV) market. Founded in 2016 and based in Belmont, North Carolina, Piedmont aims to become a key supplier of lithium products to the North American electric vehicle and battery industries, which are rapidly expanding due to the global shift towards sustainable energy. The company is centered on its flagship project, the Piedmont Lithium Project, located in the Carolina Tin-Spodumene Belt, which is one of the largest lithium resources in the United States. Piedmont is committed to environmentally responsible mining practices and aims to create a sustainable supply chain for lithium. With strategic partnerships and a focus on innovation, Piedmont Lithium is well-positioned to contribute to the electrification of transportation and the transition to a greener future. The company's mission is to deliver ethically sourced lithium to the battery supply chain while maintaining a strong commitment to sustainability and community engagement.
